sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' function Weathercard({tempInfo}) { const nowTime = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-GB') const [background, setbackground] = useState("") ("5:00:00" > nowTime > "16:00:00") ? setbackground("#191970"): setbackground("#fafafa"); const { temp, humidity, pressure, weatherMood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; return ( <>
{temp}°
{weatherMood}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString() }

19:19 PM
Sunset

19:19 PM
Humidity

19:19 PM
Pressure

19:19 PM
Wind

) } export default Weathercard
